name: Blocks Invaders
description:
Blocks Invaders is a Arcade Shoot'Em Up with puzzle elements, where you must shoot at the right time to prevent the blocks from accumulating and crushing you

Controls:

-A,D/Arrows to move, ClickJ/Ctrl to shoot.

Credits: 

All the 3d models of this game were made in Blender during the Mini Jam 71.

-Sandro Wainmaier: Game Design/Programing 

-Music: Synt Wave by Alex McCulloch (https://opengameart.org/content/synth-wave)
